content: everyday beanie chunky a free ribbed hat pattern featuring cozy 1x1 ribbing and bold stylish texture this chunky-weight beanie is a quick beginner-friendly knit that s perfect for keeping warm on chilly days the hat is worked in the round with simple crown decreases that form a satisfying x at the top pattern details yarn premier anti-pilling bamboo chunky affiliate link 1 or any chunky-weight yarn needles us 10 6 5 mm circular & dpn affiliate link 2 notions yarn needle affiliate link 3 sizes one size fits most adults adjustable due to stretchy ribbing gauge 14 stitches and 20 row = 4 inches in 1x1 rib unstretched features quick to knit with chunky yarn classic 1x1 ribbing for a snug comfortable fit stylish x crown decreases additional notes this pattern pairs perfectly
